about_the_game:
Combining the Rogue-like with puzzles resulted in an attractive deck building game.
Build your own deck and defeat the dragon ruling the forest.
Of course, the journey to the dragon will not be easy because various enemies will get in your way.
See if you're the chosen hero to defeat the dragon!



**Build your own deck**: The journey to defeat the dragon is different in every trial. The enemies you encounter, the cards you choose, and the ‘relics’ make a various style of fun each time.

**Enjoy the fun of puzzles**: Even if you get the same cards, the battle will change according to the arrangement of the puzzles or the order you choose. The characteristics of various cards and puzzles create synergy to make countless strategies.

**Explore a changing forest**: The forest changes with each challenge. You can choose the safe path or you can choose the risky path. In addition, even if you meet the same monsters, the battle pattern can be different due to puzzles, And you can enjoy the fun of exploring because there are various bosses.
